artist: Artist: Unknown German or French, 18th century
creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
description: sketched study of a male nude kneeling on PR knee with PL foot on ground, PR hand resting on small rock and PL forearm on PL thigh; foreshortened head; blue paper
medium: Black chalk with white heightening on blue paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, New York, January 13, 1989, lot 121 (as Italian School), for $1,430, to McCrindle; Joseph F. McCrindle, New York (1989-d. 2008); Joseph F. McCrindle Foundation (2008-09; given to MIA).
title: Male Academy, Kneeling, Leaning Forward on a Rock
